title: Not quite a walk in the park, but it's for charity
content:
Not quite a walk in the park, but it's for charity
More than 1,100 people walked for a good cause yesterday, with some taking a 100km route across Singapore. The Let's Take A Walk (LTAW) extreme endurance walking event, which kicked off at the National University of Singapore's Sports and Recreation …
Full News here – Read more on The Straits Times
